about_the_game:
Overview
In this expansive open-world action role-playing game, you will play as the valiant protagonist, Vico, as you embark on a series of adventures across the sprawling land of Ramchin. Engage in the seamless transitions between multiple dimensions. Through the journey, you will enhance your power and skills through battles and trials and forge your own remarkable tale in this vividly imagined world.

Story
In antiquity, a great flood swept away the dwellings of our ancestors. A giant goat bore the survivors upon its back as they drifted across the endless sea. They journeyed until the ceaseless rain subsided, revealing the once-hidden sky. However, the goat himself transformed into a vast land, with its sinews sculpting towering mountains and its arteries giving life to winding rivers. People call this place the land of Ramchin.

Millenniums later, one day, Vico got lost in a desert and stumbled upon a tram. As he prepared to board, an old man stopped him, warning him that the vehicle was a ghost tram. Subsequently, Vico found himself in a shadowy realm where two infernal messengers sought to capture him. Jolted awake by profound fear, he pondered the unsettling notion that the ghostly tram in his nightmare should appear in the real world!

This marks merely the commencement. We refrain from any more spoilers here, for the allure of this enigmatic fantasy tale is destined to captivate your imagination!

Gameplay

Beyond the abilities to run and swim, players can indulge in paragliding, self-propelled flight, and even mount a dragon to soar across the skies.

A diverse array of of items can be collected, each serving various purposes, facilitating wealth accumulation, investments, and the potential for unexpected robbing encounters. And, engaging in malicious activities in the Land of Ramchin may lead to your incarceration.

The game boasts a sophisticated system encompassing time, weather, banking, public transport, teleportation, quests, achievements, and equipment upgrades. Throughout your journey, a multitude of features ensures a continuous source of enjoyment and exploration.

Fight

In action battle mode, Vico can employ a sword for attacks, wield a shield for defence, and harness skills for additional power. Your equipment can undergo upgrades as you progress through your adventure. Make sure to pay a visit to a Landlord Shrine when you come across one!

Design
Each location is bestowed with a name derived from its origin. For instance, Juhe, which means river in the Manchu language, or Talnotog, translating to plateau in Mongolian. Every unique place holds cultural references to real-world locations.

The protagonist is meticulously crafted to embody the appearance of a seasoned adventurer, with his golden hair colour and iconic red shirt carrying significant meaning within the narrative.

Controls
It is strongly recommended that you use a game controller (Xbox controller, PS controller, joysticks) to play.

name: Land of Ramchin: Between Dimensions

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic board that works with OpenGL 4.4 or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64 bit
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1500X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Land of Ramchin is an Action RPG adventure game where players will play as Vico to explore the fantastic open world of the vast land of Ramchin, travel between dimensions and seek the origin of the world.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French
*languages with full audio support
